title: Speaking To The Public About Literally ANYTHING | StreetSmart
description: In this video, Max Fosh goes out into the streets and asks random people about their opinions on various topics, regardless of how ridiculous or nonsensical the topic may be.
summary: Max Fosh interviews the public on random and absurd topics.
payoff: The humor in this video comes from seeing the genuine reactions of the public as they try to come up with answers to absurd questions or topics, highlighting the diversity of opinions and the willingness of people to engage in conversation even about the most random subjects.
